document_data.name: Galem Meats
document_data.mainbody: '''Galem Meats''' was a smuggler who worked with the infamous [[The Guild|Guild]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Meats was a mountainous grey-skinned [[half-orc]] with long wavy lush hair. He was dressed in a simple [[breastplate]] atop bright green cloth, and carried a massive two-handed [[axe]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Jezzy worked as a muscle for a gruff [[hin]] smuggler named [[Big Huido]], transporting [[weapon]]s, [[drug]]s, and [[firewine]] into Baldur's Gate. The shipments were well defended by Galem and the rest of the crew – all were released into the hands of the members of the Guild only. One such shipment during the [[Absolute crisis]] was a chest containing [[essence of ether]], [[dream mist]], [[silkroot]], and [[terazul]] – all illegal substances in the city.
